title: Enable Native SACM
content:
Native SACM is a single solution for the entire Service Asset & Configuration Management (SACM) process with instant access to the data and embedded graphical widgets for CI topology representation.

Native SACM enables bidirectional data federation between SMA and CMS by establishing a bridge called UCMDB Gateway.

Notes:

  • UCMDB and UCMDB Gateway can be external (classic mode) or containerized (multiple deployment mode).
  • To use Native SACM, you are recommended to deploy SMA in an on-premises, AWS (EKS), Azure (AKS), or Red Hat OpenShift environment. Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is also supported starting from this release.
